meanings.sent1: She repaints her bedroom walls every year.
meanings.sent2: He repaints the fence to keep it looking nice.
meanings.sent3: The artist repaints the same canvas over and over, trying to get it just right.
meanings.sent4: Time repaints the landscape with the colors of each season.
meanings.sent5: The sun slowly repaints the sky with shades of pink and orange at sunset.

meanings.definition: To apply a fresh coat of paint to something.
meanings.sent1: They repaint the old house to make it look new again.
meanings.sent2: The homeowner repaints the front door a bright red color.
meanings.sent3: The clown repaints their face with colorful makeup before the show.
meanings.sent4: The gardener repaints the garden fence to match the blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully repaints the details of the portrait to bring it back to life.
